column1: The family will receive friends at the funeral home Monday from 5:00 p.m. until 9:00 p.m.  Funeral services to celebrate the life of Mrs. Bobbie Jean Harrison will be held Tuesday
column3: 2015 at 11:00 a.m. from the chapel of Peeples Funeral Home with Randall Harrison officiating. Interment will follow in the Spring Place Cemetery.
